statements: SELECT * FROM transportation_data WHERE start_location = 'New York'
SELECT trip_duration_minutes, vehicle_type FROM transportation_data WHERE passenger_count > 2
SELECT end_location, start_location FROM transportation_data WHERE trip_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT start_location, end_location, trip_duration_minutes FROM transportation_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car'
SELECT trip_id, passenger_count FROM transportation_data WHERE trip_duration_minutes > 30
SELECT * FROM transportation_data WHERE trip_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location FROM transportation_data WHERE trip_duration_minutes > 60
SELECT vehicle_type, COUNT(*) as trip_count FROM transportation_data GROUP BY vehicle_type ORDER BY trip_count DESC
SELECT AVG(trip_duration_minutes) as avg_trip_duration FROM transportation_data WHERE trip_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM transportation_data WHERE passenger_count BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY trip_date ASC
SELECT * FROM transportation_data;
SELECT id, city, mode_of_transport FROM transportation_data WHERE mode_of_transport = 'Car';
SELECT date, city, mode_of_transport, distance FROM transportation_data WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT city, mode_of_transport, duration FROM transportation_data WHERE duration > '01:00:00';
SELECT pattern_description, start_time, end_time FROM transportation_patterns WHERE start_time < '08:00:00' AND end_time > '17:00:00';
SELECT city, mode_of_transport, duration FROM transportation_data WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY city ASC, duration DESC
SELECT * FROM transportation_data WHERE mode_of_transport IN ('Car', 'Train') AND city = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT city, mode_of_transport, distance FROM transportation_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT city, mode_of_transport, duration FROM transportation_data WHERE duration > '01:00:00' ORDER BY duration ASC
SELECT city, mode_of_transport, distance FROM transportation_data ORDER BY distance DESC, city ASC
SELECT * FROM historic_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_city, end_city FROM historic_routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, distance_km FROM historic_routes WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY distance_km ASC;
SELECT start_city, end_city FROM historic_routes WHERE start_city='New York' AND end_city='Los Angeles';
SELECT mode_name FROM transportation_modes WHERE mode_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM historic_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_city, end_city FROM historic_routes WHERE distance_km > 1000;
SELECT route_name, distance_km FROM historic_routes ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT * FROM route_histories WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT r.route_name, m.mode_name FROM route_histories rh JOIN historic_routes r ON rh.route_id = r.route_id JOIN transportation_modes m ON rh.mode_id = m.mode_id;
SELECT * FROM historical_transportation_data;
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM historical_transportation_data;
SELECT route_id, distance FROM historical_transportation_data WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE vehicle_type = 'bus';
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM passenger_data WHERE age > 18;
SELECT * FROM historical_transportation_data
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM historical_transportation_data ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT * FROM passenger_data WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM passenger_data WHERE nationality = 'USA'
SELECT route_id, vehicle_type, capacity FROM transportation_routes
SELECT * FROM HistoricalRoutes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM HistoricalRoutes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT travel_id, route_id, travel_date FROM TravelData WHERE passenger_count > 5;
SELECT driver_name, driver_license FROM DriverInfo WHERE contact_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT * FROM VehicleInfo WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV' ORDER BY manufacture_year ASC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location, distance FROM HistoricalRoutes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT * FROM TravelData WHERE travel_date >= '2022-01-01' AND travel_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '18:00:00' ORDER BY passenger_count DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, vehicle_model, manufacture_year FROM VehicleInfo WHERE manufacture_year >= 2015 ORDER BY manufacture_year ASC
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, driver_license, contact_number FROM DriverInfo WHERE driver_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY driver_name
SELECT weather_id, travel_id, weather_condition, temperature, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND wind_speed < 10 ORDER BY temperature DESC
